edu.avans.hartigehap.domain.price

Interface PriceCalculator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPriceCalculator, HighestPriceDiscountPriceCalculator, PercentageDiscountPriceCalculator

    public interface PriceCalculator
    Created by Gijs on 10-2-14. Classes implementing this interface are responsible for the price and discount calculation.
